name: Zot Racer
description:
Zot Racer is a slick, fast paced 3D racing game. Choose your racer and map and get ready to push your racing skills to the extreme. Do you have what it takes to get the quickest time and be a Zot Racer? Features: 4 race tracks 2 car models Nitro Boost Controls:

[W] (Hold): Accelerate 

[S] (Hold): Decelerate

[A]/[D] (Hold): Turn Left/Right

[Space]: Use Boost (Hold)

[M]: Return to Title Screen

Credits: Lead:
Esteban Aldana
